Document Templates¶

Documents or document templates can be used as templates in projects. For more information on this topic, please refer to the section Document Templates in Project Structures of the user manual. The system uses ce_admin_en:cdbpws-api-cdbobjects-rules to ensure that only valid documents as templates can be used.

Always use the assigned index as a document template¶

If the option Allways use this index is activated on the assignment of document and business object, you can define the valid document using the configurable rule cdbpcs: Index-dependent Valid Documents for Instantiation.

Use the currently valid index as a document template¶

If the option Always Use this Index is not activated on the assignment of document and business object, you can define the valid document using the configurable rule cdbpcs: Documents valid for Instantiation.
